title: Textile, 1851–63
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
description: A) Wide stripe of solid pink with molette-printed moire pattern of darker pink adjoins wide white stripe divided into squares outlined by grey. Each square contains a pink rosebud with green leaves. B) Same pattern with blue stripe.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1851–63. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave. 1967-10-13-b.
